JavaScript
import React from "react" import styled from "@emotion/styled" import { css } from "@emotion/core" const Container = styled.div` margin: 3rem auto; max-width: 600px; display: flex; ` // Using css prop provides a concise and flexible API to style the components. // const underline = css` text-decoration: underline; ` export default () => ( <Container> <h1 css={underline}>About Emotion</h1> </Container> )
